author: Reuters Editorial
title: UK PM May says will need collaborative framework to oversee financial services
text:
LONDON (Reuters) - British Prime Minister said on Friday that financial services should be part of a new deep and special partnership with the European Union after Britain leaves the bloc.
Britain's makes a speech about her vision for Brexit at Mansion House in London, Britain, March 2, 2018. REUTERS/Peter Nicholls In a speech in London, May said there would need to be a collaborative, objective framework to oversee financial services after Brexit.
Reporting by Alastair Smout and Andrew MacAskill, writing by Michael Holden; editing by Guy Faulconbridge
